name: Teable
tagline: The AI database agent that transforms data into action
description: Teable turns all your data into action. From customer data and invoice data to batch marketing image & copy generation, everything about data work is easier than ever.

name: Grok 4 Fast
tagline: Pushing the frontier of cost-efficient intelligence
description: Grok 4 Fast is xAI's latest multimodal reasoning model, setting a new standard for cost-efficient intelligence. With a 2M token context window, it achieves a SOTA price-to-performance ratio. It's now available for free in the Grok app.

name: Caladan
tagline: AI fundraising copilot to connect wth 5,000+ VCs
description: Your AI copilot for smarter fundraising. Search 5,000+ VCs, craft personalized outreach, and build meaningful connections. Create a professional founder profile to share in your emails and stand out from the crowd.

name: TimeTune
tagline: Time-blocking routines, zero schedule chaos
description: TimeTune helps you organize your day into clear time blocks, build reusable routines, and track where your time actually goes. With templates, reminders, stats & schedule flexibility, it brings structure and calm to busy lives.

name: Sparky for Chrome
tagline: Easy capture while browsing. Seamlessly sync to you iPhone.
description: Sparky for Chrome helps you save the things that matterâ€”in the simplest way possible. â€” Save any link with one click. â€” Right-click to capture images or highlight text you want to keep. â€” Jot down quick notes without leaving your browser.

name: TerraCode CLI
tagline: AI Coding Assistant That Learns Your Domain Knowledge
description: TerraCode CLI by TerraAGI - AI-powered CLI coding assistant for developers. Built on Qwen's CLI with enhanced capabilities for knowledge base integration and codebase indexing for faster analysis and gold implementations.

name: ChickyTutor.com
tagline: AI language tutor with 70+ languages
description: AI voice tutor for speaking practice. Translate between languages while reasoning through grammar without memorization. 70+ languages including niche ones. Perfect bridge from Duolingo to real conversations. Start speaking today!

name: Solo Founder's Content OS
tagline: The Notion OS for Content Architects.
description: The `Solo Founder's Content OS` is a pre-loaded Notion system, not a blank template. It's the command center for founders who are ready to build a content engine, not just a list of posts. Install the architecture for your content empire.

name: Nano Banana Biz
tagline: Clone, customize and launch your own Nano Banana in minutes
description: Clone and customize professional image editor websites with our white label templates. Powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash Image. Launch your AI image editing platform today to transform any photo with simple text.

name: Youstad
tagline: Conquer IIT Dreams with Epic visual Learning
description: youstad is an AI video generator for IIT exam prep. Turn tricky JEE problems into clear, customisable video lessons instantly. Save hours with step-by-step visuals. Learn smarter today! https://app.youstad.com

name: Convo
tagline: Bridge across AI agents & workflow booster
description: Convo is the first Chrome extension to unify ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Grok & DeepSeek in one sidebar. Pioneering cross-AI context transfer and a built-in calendar, it lets you schedule sessions, organize notes, tasks & prompts into one seamless workflow.

name: The Founders Archive
tagline: Documenting the Hustle, Not Just the Headlines.
description: We built The Founders Archive to capture startup journeys as they really are successes, struggles, and lessons that matter. Itâ€™s like sitting across from a founder and hearing the story firsthand.

name: TutorFlow | AI-Powered Course Creation
tagline: Turn your idea into a course with a single prompt.
description: TutorFlow is an AI-powered learning management system (LMS) that helps you build engaging, hands-on courses in seconds. Turn a single prompt into a complete course with lessons, quizzes, and visuals included.

name: iOS App Store / Google Play
tagline: Automatic Push-Up Tracker & Counter
description: 100 Push-Ups Counter and Trainer turn your phone into your PERSONAL TRAINER. This app can automatically detect push-ups via the built-in camera. On top of that, you will get a personalized training plan and a leaderboard to compete with friends.

name: NO-CORN
tagline: Gamified Porn blocker for addiction recovery
description: Join the NO-CORN waitlist - Your gamified porn blocker and wellness tracker launching soon.

tagline: Sell on the world's biggest marketplaces in less than 5 mins
description: ChatBlu is for brand owners who want to forget about inventory management and get more eyes on their products by selling on Shopify, Amazon, Etsy, TikTok Shop, and others, within 5 minutes. We want you to focus on growth, not on endless hours on spreadsheets.
